STP.TXT: Date do not lay between the current date
Date is equal to or later than Order Date
Discount perc. do not grater than 100%
Dicount amount do not grater than subtotal detail
Do you want to save the data ?
Do You want to close this windows ?

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('Date do not lay between the current date')
MlsTrans('Date is equal to or later than Order Date')
MlsTrans('Discount perc. do not grater than 100%')
MlsTrans('Dicount amount do not grater than subtotal detail')
MlsTrans('Do You Want to save the data ?')
MlsTrans('Do You want to close this windows ?')
MlsTrans('Please Enter Project in Period Date')
MlsTrans('Invalid input of budget. Please re-check data')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(0) from OABB where NumAtCard = ':1' and DocDate between ':2' and ':3' and CANCELED = 'N'

ExpSyntax.val: NOT {32768,120} AND Trim({0,14}) <> '' AND NOT ISNULL({0,14})

StrBuild( MlsTrans('Total budget @1@ cannot be less than zero (@2@) for activity @3@ [@4@] (@5@).'), Trim(Str({0,27}, 'N4')), Trim(Str({0,19}, 'N'&{32768,139})), Trim({0,16}), Trim({0,17}), Trim(Str({0,18}, 'N'&{32768,139})) )
IF( Len(Trim({0,22})) + Len(ASCIIChr(13) & ASCIIChr(10) & Trim({0,21})) > 1000, Trim({0,22}), Trim({0,22}) & IF(Trim({0,22}) = '', '', ASCIIChr(13) & ASCIIChr(10)) & Trim({0,21}) )
StrBuild( 'DATE: @1@ -> YEAR: @2@ -> ACTIVITYYEAR: @3@', Trim(DStr({0,24}, {32768,36})), Trim(Str({0,25}, '4')), IF(ISNULL({0,28}), 'NULL', Trim({0,28})) )

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CAST(sum(Total) AS NUMERIC(18,4)) as RemainingBudget from ( SELECT ISNULL(SUM(BudgetTotal) , 0) AS Total FROM activitybudget_view where CoId = ':1' AND BplId = ':2' AND Fiscal = :3 AND Activity = ':4' AND Project = ':6' AND AcctCode = ':7' :5 union all SELECT (ISNULL(sum((d.LineTotal)), 0) * -1) AS Total FROM abb1 d WHERE d.DocEntry = :8 and d.ItemCode = ':4' and d.acctcode = ':7' and YEAR(d.shipdate) = :3 :5 ) T

ExpSyntax.val: IF(Trim({0,5}) = '' OR ISNULL({0,5}), '', ' AND OcrCode = ' & ASCIIChr(39) & Trim({0,5}) & ASCIIChr(39))
StrBuild( 'Acct @1@ ; Ocr: @2@ ; total: @3@ ; budget: @4@ ; Year @5@', Trim({0,4}), Trim({0,5}), Trim(Str({0,6}, 'N14.4')), Trim(Str({0,3}, 'N14.4')), Trim(Str({0,8}, '4')) )
NOT {32768,120} AND Trim({0,14}) <> '' AND NOT ISNULL({0,14})

StrBuild( MlsTrans('Total budget @1@ cannot be less than zero (@2@) for activity @3@ [@4@] (@5@).'), Trim(Str({0,27}, 'N4')), Trim(Str({0,19}, 'N'&{32768,139})), Trim({0,16}), Trim({0,17}), Trim(Str({0,18}, 'N'&{32768,139})) )
IF( Len(Trim({0,22})) + Len(ASCIIChr(13) & ASCIIChr(10) & Trim({0,21})) > 1000, Trim({0,22}), Trim({0,22}) & IF(Trim({0,22}) = '', '', ASCIIChr(13) & ASCIIChr(10)) & Trim({0,21}) )

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CAST(sum(Total) AS NUMERIC(18,4)) as RemainingBudget from ( SELECT ISNULL(SUM(BudgetTotal) , 0) AS Total FROM activitybudget_view where CoId = ':1' AND BplId = ':2' AND Fiscal = :3 AND Activity = ':4' AND Project = ':6' AND AcctCode = ':7' :5 union all SELECT (ISNULL(sum((d.LineTotal)), 0) * -1) AS Total FROM abb1 d WHERE d.DocEntry = :8 and d.ItemCode = ':4' and d.acctcode = ':7' :5 ) T

ExpSyntax.val: IF(Trim({0,5}) = '' OR ISNULL({0,5}), '', ' AND OcrCode = ' & ASCIIChr(39) & Trim({0,5}) & ASCIIChr(39))
StrBuild( 'Acct @1@ ; Ocr: @2@ ; total: @3@ ; budget: @4@ ; Year @5@', Trim({0,4}), Trim({0,5}), Trim(Str({0,6}, 'N14.4')), Trim(Str({0,3}, 'N14.4')), Trim(Str({0,8}, '4')) )
